items.name: Water Bottle (Empty)
items.note: Must be empty through security. Can refill after.

items.name: Water Bottle (Full)
items.note: Only allowed if 3.4 oz (100ml) or less. Must fit in quart-sized bag.

items.name: Laptop
items.note: Must be removed from bag at security screening.

items.name: Power Bank
items.note: Must be under 100Wh. Between 100-160Wh requires airline approval.

items.name: Scissors (under 4 inches)
items.note: Blades must be less than 4 inches from pivot point.

items.name: Scissors (over 4 inches)
items.note: Blades over 4 inches must be in checked luggage.

items.name: Pocket Knife
items.note: All knives prohibited in carry-on regardless of size.

items.name: Toothpaste
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz (100ml) or less in carry-on.

items.name: Shampoo
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz (100ml) or less in carry-on.

items.name: Deodorant (Solid)
items.note: Solid deodorants have no size restrictions.

items.name: Deodorant (Spray/Gel)
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz (100ml) or less in carry-on.

items.name: Razor (Disposable)
items.note: Safety razors with disposable blades are allowed.

items.name: Razor (Straight)
items.note: Straight razors must be in checked luggage.

items.name: Medications (Prescription)
items.note: Bring prescription or doctor's note. Liquids exempt from 3-1-1 rule.

items.name: Medications (Over-the-counter)
items.note: Pills and capsules allowed in any amount.

items.name: Insulin and Syringes
items.note: Must have prescription label. Notify TSA officer.

items.name: Phone Charger
items.note: No restrictions on charging cables and wall adapters.

items.name: Lighter (1)
items.note: One disposable lighter allowed in carry-on only.

items.name: Matches
items.note: One book of safety matches only. Strike-anywhere matches prohibited.

items.name: E-Cigarette / Vape
items.note: Must be in carry-on. Cannot be used on plane.

items.name: Snacks (Solid)
items.note: Solid foods like chips, cookies, crackers allowed.

items.name: Sandwich
items.note: Solid foods allowed. May be inspected.

items.name: Yogurt / Pudding
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz (100ml) or less in carry-on.

items.name: Peanut Butter
items.note: Considered a liquid. Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Baby Formula
items.note: Exempt from 3-1-1 rule. Notify TSA officer.

items.name: Breast Milk
items.note: Exempt from 3-1-1 rule. Can bring ice packs.

items.name: Ice Packs (Frozen)
items.note: Must be completely frozen at checkpoint.

items.name: Ice Packs (Gel)
items.note: If partially frozen/slushy, subject to 3.4 oz limit.

items.name: Nail Clippers
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Tweezers
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Umbrella
items.note: Standard umbrellas allowed. Subject to size restrictions.

items.name: Camera
items.note: No restrictions. Recommend carry-on for protection.

items.name: Tripod
items.note: May need to be checked if too large for overhead bin.

items.name: Bluetooth Speaker
items.note: No restrictions. Cannot be used during flight.

items.name: Headphones
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Tablet / iPad
items.note: May need to be removed at security.

items.name: E-Reader / Kindle
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Books
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Lithium Batteries (Spare)
items.note: Must be in carry-on. Under 100Wh allowed.

items.name: AA/AAA Batteries
items.note: No restrictions on standard alkaline batteries.

items.name: Sunscreen (Lotion)
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Hand Sanitizer
items.note: Up to 12 oz allowed (temporary COVID policy). Otherwise 3.4 oz limit.

items.name: Makeup
items.note: Liquid/cream makeup must be 3.4 oz or less. Powder makeup unrestricted.

items.name: Perfume / Cologne
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Hair Spray
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Contact Lens Solution
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Eye Drops
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Aerosol (Spray)
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on. Total aerosols limited in checked.

items.name: Screwdriver (under 7 inches)
items.note: Tools under 7 inches allowed in carry-on.

items.name: Screwdriver (over 7 inches)
items.note: Tools over 7 inches must be in checked luggage.

items.name: Wrench / Pliers
items.note: Under 7 inches allowed in carry-on.

items.name: Hammer
items.note: All hammers must be in checked luggage.

items.name: Baseball Bat
items.note: Sports equipment must be checked.

items.name: Golf Clubs
items.note: Must be checked. May incur fees.

items.name: Tennis Racket
items.note: Subject to size restrictions for overhead bin.

items.name: Ski Poles
items.note: Must be checked.

items.name: Walking Cane
items.note: Medical canes allowed. Subject to inspection.

items.name: Crutches
items.note: Medical devices allowed.

items.name: Wheelchair
items.note: Allowed as medical device. Battery type matters.

items.name: CPAP Machine
items.note: Does not count as carry-on item. Notify TSA.

items.name: Portable Oxygen
items.note: Must be FAA-approved. Airline notification required.

items.name: Toy Guns (Realistic)
items.note: Realistic replicas must be checked.

items.name: Nerf Guns
items.note: Clearly toy guns generally allowed.

items.name: Action Figures
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Playing Cards
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Board Games
items.note: Subject to size restrictions.

items.name: Musical Instrument (Small)
items.note: Small instruments like ukuleles generally allowed.

items.name: Guitar
items.note: May be allowed as carry-on if space available.

items.name: Drone
items.note: Batteries must follow lithium battery rules.

items.name: GoPro Camera
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Selfie Stick
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Portable Fan
items.note: Battery-powered fans allowed.

items.name: Hair Dryer
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Hair Straightener / Curling Iron
items.note: Cordless with butane cartridge must be in checked with cap.

items.name: Electric Toothbrush
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Shaving Cream
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Mouthwash
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Nail Polish
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Nail Polish Remover
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Hand Lotion
items.note: Must be 3.4 oz or less in carry-on.

items.name: Lip Balm / Chapstick
items.note: Solid lip balms unrestricted. Liquid/gel follow 3-1-1 rule.

items.name: Baby Wipes
items.note: No restrictions on wet wipes.

items.name: Disinfecting Wipes
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Tissues
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Tampons / Pads
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Thermometer
items.note: Mercury thermometers prohibited. Digital allowed.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.note: Scissors must be under 4 inches. Liquids follow 3-1-1 rule.

items.name: Band-Aids / Bandages
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Vitamins / Supplements
items.note: Pills and capsules allowed.

items.name: Protein Powder
items.note: Powders over 12 oz may require additional screening.

items.name: Coffee (Ground/Beans)
items.note: Powders over 12 oz may require additional screening.

items.name: Tea Bags
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Chocolate
items.note: Solid chocolate allowed. Liquid/cream-filled follow 3-1-1 rule.

items.name: Nuts
items.note: No restrictions on solid foods.

items.name: Dried Fruit
items.note: No restrictions.

items.name: Fresh Fruit
items.note: Allowed domestically. International may have restrictions.

items.name: Alcohol (Under 140 proof)
items.note: Mini bottles (3.4oz or less) in carry-on. Up to 5 liters in checked.

items.name: Alcohol (Over 140 proof)
items.note: Alcohol over 70% ABV prohibited on aircraft.

items.name: Duty-Free Alcohol
items.note: Must remain in sealed tamper-evident bag with receipt.

items.name: Cigarettes
items.note: No restrictions. Cannot smoke on plane.

items.name: Pepper Spray
items.note: One 4 oz container in checked if has safety mechanism.

items.name: Taser / Stun Gun
items.note: Must be in checked luggage. May have airline restrictions.

items.name: Martial Arts Equipment
items.note: Nunchucks, brass knuckles, etc. must be checked.

items.name: Ammunition
items.note: Must be in original packaging. Declare at check-in.

items.name: Flares
items.note: Flares not allowed on aircraft.

items.name: Bleach
items.note: Household bleach prohibited on aircraft.

items.name: Paint
items.note: Most paints prohibited due to flammability.

items.name: Compressed Gas
items.note: Pressurized containers generally prohibited.

items.name: Pet (Small)
items.note: Small pets in approved carriers. Airline approval required.

items.name: Service Animal
items.note: Trained service animals allowed. Documentation may be required.

items.name: Fishing Rod
items.note: May be allowed as carry-on if fits in overhead bin.

items.name: Fishing Hooks
items.note: Must be sheathed or securely wrapped.

items.name: Hiking Poles
items.note: Must be checked.

items.name: Ice Skates
items.note: Blades must be checked.

items.name: Snow Globes
items.note: Must be smaller than tennis ball with less than 3.4 oz liquid.

items.name: Candles
items.note: Solid candles allowed. Gel candles prohibited.

items.name: Dry Ice
items.note: Up to 5.5 lbs for refrigeration. Must be ventilated. Airline notification required.

items.name: Cast Iron Cookware
items.note: Allowed but may trigger additional screening.

items.name: Knitting Needles
items.note: Generally allowed. Recommend travel-sized circular needles.

items.name: Crochet Hooks
items.note: Allowed in carry-on.
